text: 17.6: Mt 17.20; 21.21; Mk 9.23; 11.23Mbe ne nzuaim, ana mbe ŋgarkarav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Nde maaŋ muuŋgip na khothɨgi tɨva bisaneŋ kha vuina kuguna bisaneŋ farar muuŋgirga, nde khaŋ kha khage suanga. ‘Ndu khaŋ thav sigi ŋgɨp, mbu mbasɨga rɨga thɨgɨ.’ Nde maaŋ suanga, ana nde nzuai kameŋ zɨn ŋgɨgɨrga.”
